title: BRIEF-AT&T Inc CEO's 2017 Total Compensation Was $28.7 Million
text: March 12, 2018 / 9:56 PM / Updated 24 minutes ago BRIEF-AT&T Inc CEO's 2017 Total Compensation Was $28.7 Million Reuters Staff 1 Min Read   AT&T Inc: * AT&T INC SAYS CEO RANDALL STEPHENSON’S 2017 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $28.7 MILLION VERSUS $28.4 MILLION IN 2016 - SEC FILING ‍​ * AT&T INC - CFO JOHN STEPHENS 2017 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $13.9 MILLION VERSUS $11.6 MILLION IN 2016 * AT&T INC SAYS CEO OF AT&T COMMUNICATIONS LLC JOHN DONOVAN'S 2017 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $15.2 MILLION VERSUS $9.5 MILLION IN 2016 Source text ( bit.ly/2p7iPVi ) Further company coverage:
